messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5676
messages.msgSnippet: wait, maybe it should be mineral rich natural sea salt.  does it  matter if we get it ground or how finely it s ground? maybe it would be better  absorbed if
messages.messageBody:
wait, maybe it should be mineral rich natural sea salt. does it matter if
we get it ground or how finely it's ground? maybe it would be better absorbed
if it were ground fresh. heck, maybe it should be made at home! or should
it be in our horse-pill multivitamin so the amount can be controlled? heh.
-lisa (tongue firmly in cheek) ;)"

This made me laugh! Sometimes I think about what would be "best" in way to
much detail. I am now visualizing fresh finely ground "Home" grown sea salt.
still LOL.
Beverly




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
